char_info.desc: The Phantoms Who Leap Through Time

a0.speaker: Kagami:
a0.dialogue: Y... you... Are you actually not a spy from that concert, are you?

a1.speaker: Reimu:
a1.dialogue: Yes. I am here to investigate that mysterious concert, and to see if there's anything fishy about it.

a2.speaker: Yumi:
a2.dialogue: So you are not a bad person after all...

a3.speaker: Kagami:
a3.dialogue: But I must warn you beforehand, that I sense something inhuman about the 'mastermind' of this concert.

a5.speaker: Kagami:
a5.dialogue: Hey, I haven't finished talking yet!
